nodes.title: Full Stack AI Engineer • Data Specialist • Technology Entrepreneur
nodes.summary: Full Stack AI Engineer and Data Specialist with 5+ years building production-ready agentic AI systems, multi-agent architectures, and scalable data platforms. Deep expertise in designing autonomous AI agents, orchestrating multi-agent workflows, and integrating LLMs into enterprise-grade pipelines with human-in-the-loop governance. Expert in computer vision, RAG systems, knowledge graphs, and high-performance data pipelines processing 500GB+ daily.

nodes.title: Cloud AI Solutions Architect
nodes.description: Architecting production-grade RAG and multi-agent systems for enterprise clients as a Cloud AI Solutions Architect at Google Cloud partner
responsibilities: Architected production-grade RAG with BigQuery + Vertex AI, reducing document analysis from weeks to minutes with offline evaluation suites for retrieval quality
Implemented agentic reinforcement loops via ADK: observability logs feeding prompt fine-tuning, reducing hallucinations and improving faithfulness scores in production
Built multi-agent systems for enterprise clients: autonomous compliance automation, contract alert agents, auto-service with Zendesk handoff and human-in-the-loop governance
achievements: Reduced document analysis time from weeks to minutes using RAG + BigQuery
Improved LLM faithfulness scores through agentic reinforcement loops
Delivered autonomous compliance and contract automation agents

nodes.title: Senior Software & Data Engineer | AI Observability
nodes.description: Led AI observability and enterprise agentic AI development for healthcare systems with HIPAA/FedRAMP compliance
responsibilities: Architected SLOs for AI pipeline latency (p50/p95) and cost-per-token monitoring using Datadog/Grafana for healthcare AI systems in HIPAA/FedRAMP compliance
Built observability dashboards tracking faithfulness and relevance metrics for LLM outputs, enabling prompt version A/B testing and continuous improvement
Led full-stack development of enterprise agentic AI applications with predictive analysis, autonomous workflow orchestration, and multi-step reasoning pipelines
achievements: Established AI observability standards for healthcare LLM systems
Enabled prompt version A/B testing through faithfulness metrics dashboards
Led enterprise agentic AI applications with autonomous workflow orchestration

nodes.title: Founding Engineer & Technical Co-founder
nodes.description: Co-founded AI-powered workforce intelligence platform serving 15+ enterprise teams with agentic Slack workflows, knowledge graphs, and autonomous team analytics
responsibilities: Designed graph-based agent orchestration with specialized agents (research, analysis, action) coordinating via shared memory and tool-use protocols
Architected TypeScript MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers enabling seamless agent-to-agent and agent-to-tool communication across enterprise ecosystems
Built autonomous Python agents using Agno, LangChain, and LangGraph with multi-step reasoning, dynamic tool selection, and self-correction loops
Implemented Zep persistent memory, Supabase vector databases, and FalkorDB graph stores integrated with commercial LLMs for long-term contextual agent memory
Developed end-to-end autonomous workflows with N8N orchestration and Slack integrations
achievements: Serving 15+ enterprise teams with AI-powered workforce intelligence
Built unified AI agent interface accessing 6+ enterprise tools
50%+ reduction in information gathering time through natural language queries

nodes.title: Senior Solutions Consultant (Solutions Consultant IV)
nodes.description: Architected enterprise-level AI and data engineering solutions specializing in knowledge graphs, fraud detection, and semantic search for financial sector clients
responsibilities: Architected Python-based API middleware and Knowledge Graph solutions for fraud detection and risk analysis in the financial sector
Developed sophisticated ontologies using Protege and RDF/OWL with REST APIs for complex business intelligence and semantic search
Collaborated with teams of 50+ engineers on enterprise data engineering optimizations and API integrations
achievements: Led enterprise AI implementations for large-scale financial clients
Delivered complex business intelligence and fraud risk analysis solutions
Managed collaboration across teams of 50+ engineers and consultants

nodes.title: Full Stack Engineer | VR & Real-Time Systems
nodes.description: Developed full-stack VR solutions for healthcare training and wellness applications with 3D physics simulations and real-time systems
responsibilities: Developed full-stack VR solutions using React frontend with Node.js backend for training and wellness applications with 3D object interaction and physics simulations
Built scalable REST APIs with queues for asynchronous processing and pub/sub for real-time communication between system components
Engineered pipelines for processing large 3D video files and game updates compiled in Unity and Unreal Engine
achievements: Successfully implemented HIPAA and FedRAMP compliance protocols
Processed large 3D video files and Unity/Unreal game updates through queue system

nodes.title: Senior Data Engineer
nodes.description: Led development of large-scale financial data processing systems for banking-as-a-service platform processing 500GB+ daily
responsibilities: Processed 500GB+ daily with PySpark on Dataproc, optimizing gRPC latency and cloud cost efficiency — infrastructure patterns now applied to AI workloads
Designed Delta Lake on GCS with ACID transactions for audit compliance, enabling data versioning critical for ML reproducibility
achievements: Achieved 40% performance improvement in data processing

nodes.title: Backend Developer & IoT Specialist
nodes.description: Built IoT + ML pipelines for livestock monitoring with Raspberry Pi and real-time behavioral analysis
responsibilities: Built sensor integration systems on Raspberry Pi for livestock monitoring
Created end-to-end processing pipelines for real-time livestock health prediction
Implemented distributed solutions using BalenaCLI for remote device management

nodes.title: Backend Developer
nodes.description: Built scalable APIs and web scraping solutions for enterprise data collection and automation
responsibilities: Built scalable APIs using FastAPI, Flask, and Django REST, creating middleware layer abstracting database complexity
Developed robust web scraping solutions using Scrapy and Requests for enterprise data collection
Delivered complete full-stack solutions with ReactJS frontend deployed on AWS and Docker containers

nodes.degree: Bachelor of Science in Systems Analysis and Development
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
